documentType: FBI operational plan / search warrant execution document
summary: This is an FBI operational document detailing the planned execution of a search warrant on Little Saint James Island (LSJ) in the US Virgin Islands on August 12, 2019. The document identifies LSJ as owned by Jeffrey Epstein and subject to a child sex trafficking investigation. It includes weather forecasts, nautical reports, and detailed structural descriptions of the island's buildings.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the owner of Little Saint James Island and the subject of a Child Sex Trafficking investigation.

events.title: Planned FBI search warrant execution on Little Saint James Island
events.description: The FBI New York Office Criminal Division Branch C planned to execute a search warrant on Jeffrey Epstein's private island, Little Saint James, as part of a child sex trafficking investigation.

locations: Little Saint James Island (LSJ), USVI, USA
keyFacts: The FBI planned to execute a search warrant on Jeffrey Epstein's private island, Little Saint James, on August 12, 2019.
The island was identified as the subject of a Child Sex Trafficking investigation.
The document contains highly detailed structural descriptions and maps of the island's buildings (labeled A, B, C, D sectors).
The document includes weather and nautical reports for the planned operation date and surrounding days.
The operational plan indicates a high level of pre-execution surveillance and intelligence gathering on the property.
